actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Government Operations (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Government Operations, S. Rept. 93-242.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 93-330.

official_title: A resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on Government Operations for an inquiry and investigation relating to Government procurement practices, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Authorizes supplemental expenditures for the Senate Committee on Government Operations. Increases to $89,672 the appropriation for a study of Government procurement practices by the Committee.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on Government Operations for an inquiry and investigation relating to Government procurement practices, and for other purposes.
